name: The Great Gatsby
description: A novel set in the Roaring Twenties, depicting the journey of the enigmatic Jay Gatsby.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A novel of racial injustice and moral growth.
author: Harper Lee

name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: The first book in the Harry Potter series.
author: J.K. Rowling

name: The Hobbit
description: The prelude to the Lord of the Rings trilogy.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

name: Pride and Prejudice
description: A classic novel about love and social standing.
author: Jane Austen

name: Moby-Dick
description: The story of Captain Ahab's obsession with a giant white whale.
author: Herman Melville

name: Catch-22
description: A satirical novel about military life during World War II.
author: Joseph Heller

name: Brave New World
description: A novel that explores a future society driven by technological advancements.
author: Aldous Huxley

name: The Catcher in the Rye
description: A novel about teenage rebellion and angst.
author: J.D. Salinger
